steps.name: Given I make a POST request to "addNewPet" endpoint with payload "addNewPet.json" and JavaScript injection values for fields:
Then Verify the API response status code is "500"
Then I save api response as "ErrorJavaScriptInjectionResponse"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: API Tests for Add New Pet - POST Request

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Add New Pet with JavaScript injection values for Required Fields in the payload

name: Add New Pet with JavaScript injection values for Required Fields in the payload
description:
This feature file tests the POST API endpoint "addNewPet" with various scenarios, including:
    - Valid payloads for successful pet creation
    - Missing, invalid, or malformed payloads
    - Payloads with missing, extra, blank, null, long, or special character values
    - Payloads with injection attacks (SQL, JavaScript, server command)
    - Missing or malformed headers
    - Edge cases like emojis and extra header keys
fullName: src\features\api\PetStoreApi\POST_AddNewPet.feature#Add New Pet with JavaScript injection values for Required Fields in the payload
